<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Clockwork Soldier](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1096)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These diligent machines guard their assigned posts tirelessly. A typical clockwork soldier stands 6 feet tall and consists of 500 pounds of metal and magic.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Clockwork_ClockworkSoldier.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Clockwork Soldier](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1096)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 49</row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +4

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Wind-Up** 24 hours, DC 22, standby

**Items**
_+1 [halberd](/Weapons.aspx?ID=26)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 80

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poisoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
physical 5 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) or orichalcum)

**Weaknesses**
electricity 5, [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=378) 5

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_halberd_ +18 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d10+9 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d8+9 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Activate Defenses** <actions string="Single Action" />  One of the soldier's external plates extends on a mechanical actuator to defend the soldier or an adjacent creature of the soldier's choice. The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the soldier's next turn, or until it is no longer adjacent to the soldier, whichever comes first. The soldier can have no more than one plate extended at a time.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-223" />
name: Clockwork Soldier
